original_text: And on the day that the tabernacle was reared up the cloud covered the tabernacle, namely, the tent of the testimony: and at even there was upon the tabernacle as it were the appearance of fire, until the morning.
korean_text: 성막을 세운 날에 구름이 성막 곧 증거의 성막을 덮었고 저녁이 되면 성막 위에 불 모양 같은 것이 나타나서 아침까지 이르렀으되

sentences.original_text: And on the day that the tabernacle was reared up
namely, the tent of the testimony
and at even there was upon the tabernacle
as it were the appearance of fire
